title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Thoroughly gather, document, and organize the requirements for the IncidentResponseOrchestrator platform. These requirements should include details about the types of incidents it should handle, the tools and teams it should integrate with, the desired automation and orchestration workflows, any specific security, compliance, or regulatory requirements, as well as user stories and use cases that illustrate how the system will be used in various scenarios. The document should also outline the technical architecture and APIs for integration.

title: Design System Architecture for IncidentResponseOrchestrator
description: Design the overall architecture of the IncidentResponseOrchestrator platform, including the components, data flow, integration points with external tools and systems, communication protocols, security considerations, scalability and performance requirements, and provide a detailed design documentation.

title: Develop Data Models and Database Schema
description: Design and implement the data models and database schema required to store incident data, workflow configurations, and other relevant information.

title: Implement Core Incident Management Functionality
description: Develop the core functionality for incident management, including incident creation, tracking, and resolution.
dependencies: Develop Data Models and Database Schema

title: Develop Automation and Orchestration Workflows
description: Implement the automation and orchestration workflows for incident response, including integration with external tools and systems.

title: Build User Interface and Dashboard
description: Design and develop the user interface and dashboard for the IncidentResponseOrchestrator platform, allowing users to view and manage incidents, configure workflows, and monitor system status.

title: Implement Security and Access Control
description: Develop and integrate security features and access control mechanisms to ensure the platform is secure and accessible only to authorized users and teams.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a continuous integration and deployment pipeline for the IncidentResponseOrchestrator platform, including automated testing, build, and deployment processes.

title: Conduct Comprehensive Testing
description: Plan and execute comprehensive testing of the IncidentResponseOrchestrator platform, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests, to ensure its functionality and reliability.

title: Prepare Documentation and User Guides
description: Create comprehensive documentation and user guides for the IncidentResponseOrchestrator platform, covering installation, configuration, usage, and troubleshooting.
